name: Overcrowdead
description:
Attention: This game was made to see how quickly you could turn the assets from UnitZ into a Build and distribute it. The answer was 3 minutes. Decided to upload it so you could have a go at it. and see what it is all about. but for free, and not ask actual money for it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sandbox, multiplayer, open world game in a few steps. The game also with several different gameplay modes.

System Requirements:

    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows xp / 10.5.6 / Ubuntu
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Athlon 64 X2
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Radeon HD2600 XT 256 MB Video Memory
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
    • OS: Windows 7 / 10.10.2 / Ubuntu
    • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 610
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
